1.content:
John leaned back in his sofa and felt the weight of his hefty gut settle on his middle. The big soft expanse he called his body had been growing steady all his 20 years of life and the tiger had now reached a point where he tried to avoid moving, because moving nearly 600 pounds of fat is quite tiresome. He poked his soft, saggy chest a bit and took in the mountain of fat that rose behind it before he turned his attention to the TV. A chubby lion then walked in carrying a bottle of soda and some snacks which he placed within easy reach of the obese tiger. The lion was Peter, his boyfriend. They had met just over four years ago and had been an item nearly from their first meet. He hadn't been nearly as fat then, although big enough to struggle in stairs and preferring activities that could be done in a chair inside.
Most of his waking hours now were spent in the sofa.

Peter rubbed his boyfriends huge belly gently. It had gotten so big. When they first met Peter had no idea how much boyfriend he would get. At first he thought it was awesome, but when John crossed 400 without signs of slowing down he was getting worried things were out of hand. 400 was big enough, now need to go further he told John. But he didn't listen, either from laziness, or from a wish to get bigger. He heard his loves labored breaths and he noticed how he rarely moved nowadays. Come to think of it, it must be at least three months since last he left the apartment. Peter was worried and was trying to think of how he could get John to take better care of his health.
His train of thoughts were interrupted by John snatching his arm and pulling him for a kiss.
'What are you thinking about honey?'
'You' Peter answered, doing his best to not let his concern show

After the kiss Peter sat down next to John, feeling the warm, fluffy softness of his tiger against him. As the tiger devoured his snack Peter looked down at his own belly, now covering his groin completely and starting to sag down on the side of his thighs. Ever since he crossed 250 lbs he had been a bit worried and embarrassed, although having a boyfriend nearly twice his size helped his self image. But still, his current 260 lbs was more than he was comfortable with.
His train of thoughts was ended when John good heavily up from the sofa. He took a moment to catch his breath, then he unbuttoned his shirt, letting his belly flow out.
"This shirt is getting to tight, I can hardly breath in it" he said.
Peter just nodded as he looked at the massive amount of tiger in front of him and he once again felt what he only thought of as "that feeling", a sort of weird attraction to the that belly, to seeing it grow, seeing it make his boyfriend struggle to walk, rip his clothes and breathe heavy. He resented that feeling, knowing that all that weight was dangerous, but still, whenever he saw it like this, all stuffed from breakfast and the recent snack, hanging out of a shirt that definitely was a bit tight while John was breathing hard just from getting up and standing he felt strongly attracted to it. 600 lbs of tiger, all his.
John stretched, sending ripples through his whole, soft body and Peter could take it no more. He got up and wrapped his arms as far around Johns soft middle as he could and kissed him on the nose.
"Then take it off, you look better without it anyway"

12.content:
Peter couldn't stop thinking about his love's gaining weight. He knew that if John doesn't want to do anything else then eating food and watch TV that's fine, but he himself wanted more of life. He would want to go places and see things all over the world, and he wanted to share it with his big cuddly tiger. He knew that John's tiger body was build to hold more weight then a lion's would and that he could still move and walk around (With some effort that is), but one day he will reach that point when he won't be able to even get out of bed, and he wants to gain some nice memories of their time together before that happens.

"Are you sure there is nothing wrong dear?" John asked, waking the lion up from his dreams. He had been staring for probably a full minute at John without saying anything. What should he do? Should he come clean and tell him what he thinks? "You know you can tell me anything you want, without it making me upset." John added, resting one of his thick paws on the lion's leg.

"John..." Peter started with a slight pause. "You know I have always love you and done everything you like just to see you happy?" "Yes?" John answered, unsure of what was going to happen. "It's just that it feels like we never do anything together anymore." Peter said, with some force. "But, we do things together. We eat snacks, watch TV, and..." John started before getting interrupted by Peter. "You don't understand. We don't do things that other couple do. We never go out on a restaurant, to the movies, heck, we haven't even been outside looking at nature for several months!" "I don't get what the problem is." John said, wanting to understand his boyfriend. "It's just that you are always stuck inside this house, when there's a whole world outside." Peter said, and did a gesture with his hands to symbolise a big globe. "Do you want to go on a vacation together?" John asked him. "Yes! That is exactly what I want." Peter said, and got up from the sofa. "Just imagine all the places and people, the unique natures and animals, the exotic foods and flavours." "Foods and flavours?" John said with a small drool coming from his mouth. "See, I knew there would be something that would suit you too." Peter said, and patted his tiger's big gut. "Okay. I'm convicted. I will take and go on a vacation with you, but only if you promise it will have great food there." John said happily. "I will make that my first order of business." Peter said, and they both shake hands on it.

Peter was now feeling like he was on cloud nine. He would finally be able to see some of the worlds wonders, and he would be able to share it with his favourite fur of them all. Looking through a bunch of websites on great places to go he knew he to find something that would both have great tourists attractions for him, and some great food for John. And after doing a bunch of research's he finally decides that the place they will go to would be...
12.title: A bonding vacation.

info.brief_description: A fat fur story I began writing, but gave up on. Obese tiger with a worried lion boyfriend
info.description:
John and Peter have been together for four years, during which John has grown very fat and now Peter is getting worried.


No unexpected deaths
A story must have at least 25 chapters before it ends
The point of view must be either John or Peter, you can change freely. Just remember to separate with paragraphs
Magic allowed as long as it's not overdone
Same with sci-fi stuff and such, everything goes as long as it's not overdone and the reader is given the chance to choose a realistic setting (Example: If you bring in magic, make sure at least one option continues the storyline. Of course, this does not apply once you are in a story line with magic)
